Class TextViewUtil

java.lang.Object

public class TextViewUtil
extends Object

Helper methods for manipulating TextView objects.

setAlignment

public static void setAlignment(android.widget.TextView textview,
                                int alignment,
                                boolean centerVertically)
TextView alignment setter.

Parameters:
alignment - one of Component.ALIGNMENT_NORMAL, Component.ALIGNMENT_CENTER or Component.ALIGNMENT_OPPOSITE
centerVertically - whether the text should be centered vertically

setBackgroundColor

public static void setBackgroundColor(android.widget.TextView textview,
                                      int argb)
TextView background color setter. Generally, the caller will not pass Component.COLOR_DEFAULT, instead substituting in the appropriate color.

Parameters:
textview - text view instance
argb - background RGB color with alpha

isEnabled

public static boolean isEnabled(android.widget.TextView textview)
Returns the enabled state a TextView.

Parameters:
textview - text view instance
Returns:
true for enabled, false disabled

Parameters:
textview - text view instance
enabled - true for enabled, false disabled

setFontTypeface

public static void setFontTypeface(android.widget.TextView textview,
                                   int typeface,
                                   boolean bold,
                                   boolean italic)
Sets the font typeface for a TextView.

Parameters:
textview - text view instance
typeface - one of @link Component#TYPEFACE_DEFAULT}, Component.TYPEFACE_SERIF, Component.TYPEFACE_SANSSERIF or Component.TYPEFACE_MONOSPACE
bold - true for bold, false for not bold
italic - true for italic, false for not italic

Returns the text for a TextView.
